column1: CREATE CONSTRAINT IF NOT EXISTS FOR (u:Usuario) REQUIRE u.id IS UNIQUE
CREATE CONSTRAINT IF NOT EXISTS FOR (f:Filme)  REQUIRE f.id IS UNIQUE
CREATE CONSTRAINT IF NOT EXISTS FOR (a:Ator)   REQUIRE a.id IS UNIQUE
CREATE CONSTRAINT IF NOT EXISTS FOR (d:Diretor) REQUIRE d.id IS UNIQUE
CREATE CONSTRAINT IF NOT EXISTS FOR (g:Genero) REQUIRE g.id IS UNIQUE
CREATE CONSTRAINT IF NOT EXISTS FOR (s:Serie)  REQUIRE s.id IS UNIQUE
